projetos.title: The CDE that organizes
projetos.desc: Common Data Environment (CDE) to centralize architectural, structural, hydraulic, and electrical projects. Version control, approval workflows, and automatic distribution for field and office teams.

workforce.title: Supplier qualification and
workforce.desc: Supplier onboarding with mandatory document checklists — CNPJ, CND, CRF, CNDT, health certificates, safety certifications, FGTS, INSS. Biometric access control and AI-powered validation via GD4 Agents.

ai.desc: GD4 Agents automatically validate company registrations, tax clearance certificates, FGTS compliance, labor clearances, health certificates, safety certifications (NR-18, NR-35, NR-10), technical registrations, payroll reports, and invoices. Each agent specializes in one document type.
ai.catCompanyDocs: Registration, Tax Clearance, FGTS, Labor Cert., Articles
ai.catWorkerDocs: Health Cert., NR-18, NR-35, NR-10, PPE Record
ai.catFiscalDocs: Payroll Report, Social Security, Invoices, Tax Withholdings
ai.step1: Extracting CRF data — Federal Savings Bank
ai.step2: Validating supplier registration with Federal Revenue

personas.title: A solution for every
personas.desc: Developers, builders, designers, and contractors — everyone finds the right tools for their operation at Autodoc.
personas.developerDesc: Simplify enterprise management. Consolidated view of projects, documents, and compliance across your entire portfolio.
personas.builderDesc: Control the lifecycle, productivity, and quality of your construction. From planning to delivery, all in one platform.
personas.designerDesc: Coordinate construction projects and deliverables with BIM software. Revision control and automatic distribution.
personas.contractorDesc: Manage teams digitally. Worker documentation, health certificates, safety certifications, and PPE always up to date.

compliance.label: Documents automatically validated by GD4 Agents

journey.title: The journey of
journey.desc: Leaders in digital solutions for risk reduction and productivity improvement in civil construction.
journey.era1Desc: Physical folders, blueprint copies, and shelf archives. Risk of loss and outdated versions.
journey.era2Desc: Document digitization, PDFs, and Excel spreadsheets. Local files without version control.
journey.era3Desc: Cloud platforms with CDE, revision control, and automatic distribution. The era of Autodoc Projects.
journey.era4Desc: 21 GD4 Agents validating documents automatically. Document Management 4.0 — from minutes to seconds.

whyAutodoc.title: The platform that the
whyAutodoc.desc: 20+ years of experience in construction technology. An Ambar company, alongside Polar and Simple Wall.
whyAutodoc.complianceDesc: Continuous validation of FGTS, INSS, CNDT, health certificates, safety certs, and clearances. Automatic alerts before expiration. Zero risk of fines for irregular documentation.
whyAutodoc.timeDesc: Validations that took 30-60 minutes per document are now completed in 2-5 minutes by GD4 Agents. Your team focuses on construction, not paperwork.
whyAutodoc.platformDesc: Projects, blueprints, technical documents, suppliers, workers, and AI validation in a single platform. From office to jobsite.
whyAutodoc.supplierDesc: Self-service environment where suppliers submit documents, track status, and receive real-time feedback. Fewer calls, more productivity.
whyAutodoc.agentsDesc: Each agent specialized in one document type: company registration, tax clearance, FGTS, labor cert., health cert., safety certs., technical reg., payroll, invoices. 24/7 validation with over 97% accuracy.
whyAutodoc.scalableDesc: From a single project to a portfolio of 200+ simultaneous developments. The platform grows with your operation, maintaining performance and control.

items.question: What is Autodoc?
items.answer: Autodoc is a digital management platform for civil construction that integrates projects, documents, suppliers, and workforce in a single environment. With two products — Autodoc Projects (CDE) and Autodoc Workforce (supplier and jobsite management) — and 21 AI agents for automatic document validation, the platform automates processes, reduces risks, and increases your site's productivity. Autodoc is an Ambar company with over 20 years in the market.

items.question: What's the difference between Autodoc Projects and Autodoc Workforce?
items.answer: Autodoc Projects is a CDE (Common Data Environment) for managing architectural, structural, hydraulic, and electrical projects, with revision control, approval workflows, and automatic distribution. Autodoc Workforce focuses on supplier and jobsite management: onboarding, document validation (company registration, tax clearances, health certificates, safety certifications, PPE), biometric access control, and labor compliance. Together, they cover the entire construction cycle.

items.question: What are GD4 Agents and what documents do they validate?
items.answer: GD4 Agents are 21 AI systems specialized in automatic document validation. They cover 4 categories: Company (registration, federal tax clearance, FGTS compliance, labor clearance, articles of incorporation), Worker (health certificate, NR-18, NR-35, NR-10, NR-33, PPE record), Technical (technical registration ART/RRT, construction permit, environmental license), and Fiscal (payroll report, social security, invoices, withholdings). Each agent extracts data, validates compliance, and generates an automatic report.

items.question: Which construction companies use Autodoc?
items.answer: Autodoc is used by over 3,500 companies, including 60 of the top 100 construction companies in Brazil — MRV, Direcional, Tenda, Cury, Cyrela, Even, and Patrimar, among others. There are over 195,000 active users on the platform.

items.question: Is Autodoc compatible with BIM?
items.answer: Yes. Autodoc Projects features an integrated BIM viewer, compatible with leading modeling software (Revit, ArchiCAD, Tekla). You can upload IFC models, view them on the platform, and link them to corresponding projects and documents.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Implementation is quick and guided. Our Customer Success team handles onboarding, data migration, and training. Most clients are operational in under 2 weeks. For larger operations (100+ projects), the typical timeline is 4-6 weeks with dedicated support.
